title: E-scooter makers plan to power up portfolio with more affordable models
description: The execution of the next phase of the growth strategy comes as the brands have managed to seed the market with their top-of-the-line models. This is even as the competition in the segment has notched up with the entry of a flurry of startups over the last two years.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
